snippet: Issa Rae’s anecdotal, experiential comedy has pushed the online series “The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl” into a second season, and toward more mainstream outlets.
abstract: Jon Caramanica notes that Issa Rae’s anecdotal, experiential comedy has pushed the online series The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl into a second season, and toward more mainstream outlets.
lead_paragraph: Issa Rae’s anecdotal, experiential comedy has pushed the online series “The Misadventures of Awkward Black Girl” into a second season, and toward more mainstream outlets.

headline.seo: Issa Rae and ‘Awkward Black Girl’ Are Breaking Ground
headline.main: Life’s Hard, Web Series Gracefully Illustrates
